summary: A crime novelist, whose research on Victorian serial killers has turned him into a paranoid wreck, must confront his worst fears, when a film executive takes a sudden interest in his movie script.
cast: Simon Pegg|Alan Drake|Kiran Shah|Jack Jaikol Situn|Michael Feast|Henry Bowers-Broadbent|Clare Higgins|Paul Freeman|Mo Idriss|Doug Tulloch|Elliot Greene|Josh Warner-Campbell|Harley Kierans|Kamal Onyiukah|Millie Hagland|Pamela Cundell|Baxter Westby|Teresa Churcher|Karan Plah|Bernard Cribbins|Don McCulloch|Golda John|Tuyet Le|Tamzin Griffin|Jane Stanness|Jacqueline Chan|Amara Karan|Simon Kunz|Henry Lloyd-Hughes|Anna Madeley|Jay Taylor|Zaak Conway|Mara Ashton|Charlie Covell|Johnny Alston|Lieve Carchon|Gary Golding|Alice Orr-Ewing|Keshava Mills|Kerry Shale|Bhanu Alley|Fabio Vollono
